en.answer:
Yes, you can.

If your attempt to Xyz Summon Cyber Dragon Infinity using the『once per turn, you can also Xyz Summon "Cyber Dragon Infinity" by using "Cyber Dragon Nova" you control as material』procedure is negated, you can attempt to Xyz Summon Cyber Dragon Infinity this way again during this turn.

~~~

The same applies to:
● Poseidra Abyss, the Atlantean Dragon Lord
● Madolche Queen Tiarafraise
● Full Armored Utopic Ray Lancer
● Xyz Armor Fortress
● Full Armored Dark Knight Lancer
● Gigantic "Champion" Sargas
● Kashtira Arise-Heart
● Galaxy-Eyes Cipher X Dragon
● Divine Arsenal AA-ZEUS - Sky Thunder
● Drill Driver Vespenato
● Odd-Eyes Rebellion Dragon Overlord
● Dingirsu, the Orcust of the Evening Star
● Superdreadnought Rail Cannon Juggernaut Liebe
● Dark Armed, the Dragon of Annihilation
● Zoodiac Hammerkong
● Zoodiac Chakanine
● Zoodiac Tigermortar
● Zoodiac Drident
● Zoodiac Broadbull
en.question:
I attempt to Xyz Summon Cyber Dragon Infinity by using my Cyber Dragon Nova as material, but that Xyz Summon is negated by the effect of Angel Statue - Azurune.

If I Special Summon a second Cyber Dragon Nova during this turn, can I use it to Xyz Summon Cyber Dragon Infinity?
en.title: If I attempt to Xyz Summon Cyber Dragon Infinity, but that Xyz Summon is negated, can I Xyz Summon Cyber Dragon Infinity again?

ja.question:
「<<10870>>」の上に重ねて「<<11765>>」をエクシーズ召喚する際に、そのエクシーズ召喚が「<<15770>>」等の効果によって無効になりました。

そのターンに、「<<10870>>」を再び特殊召喚している場合、エクストラデッキに存在する２体目の「<<11765>>」をエクシーズ召喚できますか？
ja.title: 「<<11765>>」のエクシーズ召喚が無効になった場合、そのターンにもう１度「<<11765>>」をエクシーズ召喚できますか？
